mapper.sql: id, originalName, fileName, imgType, comQuestionId, comAnswerId, createTime, filePath
mapper.select: select id, fileName, imgType from tb_community_images where comQuestionId = #{comquestionid,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by id ASC
select id, fileName, imgType from tb_community_images where comAnswerId = #{comanswerid,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by id ASC
mapper.insert: insert into tb_community_images (id, originalName, fileName, imgType, comQuestionId, comAnswerId, createTime, filePath) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{originalname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comquestionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comanswerid,jdbcType=INTEGER},now(), #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into tb_community_images
id,
originalName,
fileName,
imgType,
comQuestionId,
comAnswerId,
createTime,
filePath,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

#{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{imgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

now(),
#{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update tb_community_images
originalName = #{originalname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fileName = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imgType = #{imgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comQuestionId = #{comquestionid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
comAnswerId = #{comanswerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
filePath = #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_community_images set originalName = #{originalname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fileName = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imgType = #{imgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comQuestionId = #{comquestionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comAnswerId = #{comanswerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, filePath = #{filepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
